tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clothing_inventory (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    item_category VARCHAR(50),
    item_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    item_stock INT
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    quantity_changed INT
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    item_description TEXT,
    item_category VARCHAR(50),
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity_available INT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    quantity_ordered INT,
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES clothing_items(item_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_items (
    item_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    item_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE item_inventory (
    inventory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT REFERENCES clothing_items(item_id),
    location_id INT REFERENCES item_locations(location_id),
    quantity_in_stock INT NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE item_transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT REFERENCES clothing_items(item_id),
    location_id INT REFERENCES item_locations(location_id),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_items (
    item_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    item_category VARCHAR(50),
    item_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    stock_quantity INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    inventory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT REFERENCES clothing_items(item_id),
    size_id INT REFERENCES sizes(size_id),
    color_id INT REFERENCES colors(color_id),
    quantity INT NOT NULL
);
